title: A continuous cuffless blood pressure measurement from optimal PPG characteristic features using machine learning algorithms
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Araf Nishan, S. M. Taslim Uddin Raju, Md Imran Hossain, Safin Ahmed Dipto, S. M. Tanvir Uddin, Asif Sijan, Md Abu Shahid Chowdhury, Ashfaq Ahmad, Md Mahamudul Hasan Khan
